name: nonstationary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
moving or changing rather than staying still: We are operating in a nonstationary but stable environment. The shape of the graph will change when inflation is non-stationary.
More examplesFewer examplesWe have created both a stationary and a nonstationary version of the model.He argues that the world is non-stationary and unstructured, so we cannot always predict what will happen.They studied comets, asteroids, meteors, and nonstationary stars. Astronomers think that this phenomenon may be responsible for non-stationary magnetic fields.
